member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298
member.summary: A MotorDriverL298 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298.SetSpeed(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298.Motor,System.Double)
member.param: The motor to set the speed for.
The desired speed of the motor between -1 and 1.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298.SetSpeed(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298.Motor,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.param: The motor to set the speed for.
The desired speed of the motor between -1 and 1.
How many milliseconds the motor should take to reach the specified speed.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorDriverL298.Frequency
member.summary: Used to set the PWM frequency for the motors because some motors require a certain frequency in order to operate properly. It defaults to 25KHz (25000).
